name: Geometry Wave
description:
Geometry Wave is a Survival - bullet-hell game.

In this game your goal is to survive as long as possible with your laser-shooting sword and eliminate all thoses pesky red triangles.

But be careful, not only missiles are coming your way but every 10 seconds a random effect happens.

Random effects can go from increased enemy rates for the rest of the game to an missile brust or a speed up.

This game was made solo in the Ludum Dare 51, sounds made with sfxr and beepbox.
